title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: On the 15th of September 1826, at alate hour in the evening, a man and a woman might have been seen coming alongthe High Riggs on their way to the WestPort The man was the companion ofEvelyn Douglas, and the woman was hisparamour. She carried an infant in herarms, carefully wrapped up from the chiUair of night.
